title: 03/18/21 DPS Hour 1 Aaron Wilson
itunes:title: 03/18/21 DPS Hour 1 Aaron Wilson
description:
Dan Patrick is joined by the Houston Chronicle's Aaron Wilson to discuss the latest in the legal action being taken against Deshaun Watson over alleged sexual harassment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
